Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.animations

Class AnimationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.AbstractBlenderHelper
      • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.animations.AnimationHelper
  • public class AnimationHelper
extends AbstractBlenderHelper
    The helper class that helps in animations loading.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

    • Constructor Detail

        public AnimationHelper​(java.lang.String blenderVersion,

    • Method Detail

      • loadAnimations

        public void loadAnimations()
                    throws BlenderFileException
        Loads all animations that are stored in the blender file. The animations are not yet applied to the scene features. This should be called before objects are loaded.
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with blender file reading occur

      • applyAnimations

        public void applyAnimations​(com.jme.scene.Node node,
                            BlenderKey.AnimationMatchMethod animationMatchMethod)
        The method applies animations to the given node. The names of the animations should be the same as actions names in the blender file.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to whom the animations will be applied
        animationMatchMethod - the way animation should be matched with node

      • applyAnimations

        public void applyAnimations​(com.jme.scene.Node node,
                            com.jme.animation.Skeleton skeleton,
                            BlenderKey.AnimationMatchMethod animationMatchMethod)
        The method applies skeleton animations to the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node where the animations will be applied
        skeleton - the skeleton of the node
        animationMatchMethod - the way animation should be matched with skeleton

      • fromIpoStructure

        public Ipo fromIpoStructure​(Structure ipoStructure,
                            BlenderContext blenderContext)
                     throws BlenderFileException
        This method creates an ipo object used for interpolation calculations.
        Parameters:
        ipoStructure - the structure with ipo definition
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        the ipo object
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - this exception is thrown when the blender file is somehow corrupted

      • fromValue

        public Ipo fromValue​(float constValue)
        This method creates an ipo with only a single value. No track type is specified so do not use it for calculating tracks.
        Parameters:
        constValue - the value of this ipo
        Returns:
        constant ipo

      • getCurveType

        public int getCurveType​(Structure structure,
                        BlenderContext blenderContext)
        This method returns the type of the ipo curve.
        Parameters:
        structure - the structure must contain the 'rna_path' field and 'array_index' field (the type is not important here)
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        the type of the curve
